hackathon-description-text: Hero City Hacks is hosted at Tim Draper's Hero City in San Mateo. We are excited to invite hackers, designers, and entrepreneurs to come compete for cash prizes and other prizes the weekend of Nov. 8-9.
hackathon-eligibility: All teams must be present during hackathon, and submit project by required time.
hackathon-requirements: By 11am all submissions must be complete.
hackathon-rules: All coding must be done during event.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: First place Best Health & Fitness Idea

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=55 East 3rd Avenue, San Mateo, CA 94401, USA
hackathon-location-address: 55 East 3rd Avenue, San Mateo, CA 94401, USA
hackathon-description-header: Swagger Hacker champions the best and brightest innovators, giving them a chance to think big and make an impact. We organize the best of Silicon Valley and empower them to make an impact.
